markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Skirmish Strike](/Feats.aspx?ID=4880) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Flourish" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=73" />
<trait label="Ranger" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=682" />
<trait label="Rogue" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=687" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 160 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Drow Shootist](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=90) (Level 10)

</column>

---

Your feet and weapon move in tandem. Either [Step](/Actions.aspx?ID=87) and then [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=89), or Strike and then Step.
name: Skirmish Strike
